item.title: How_to_pizza.jpg
item.description: Pizza time! After a well deserved break with 6(!!) days of vacation, I’m back! Not really feeling the urge to pick up some new crypto stuff to write about just yet, but “den som väntar på något gott” :) This saturday me and my good friend Elin had our joint birthday party. It all started with a case of beers and a jacuzzi, where we decided to host a party where we cooked Neapolitan pizza for everyone, one pizza each, just like a one-night, pop-up pizza place.
